name: Get Better
description:
Trigger Warnings: Suicidal Ideation, The American Healthcare system

Best played with volume! But don't turn it up too high because the initial instance of The Sound is honestly pretty loud! 

Context/Notes: This is a student project made for a 3-week assignment. I did not change my game at all since the initial deadline. The story is very linear but the Suicidal Ideation segment does have some variation [Every choice in this section is meant to portray a fairly unhealthy mindset, please heed the trigger warnings.]  

Disclaimer: I can normally draw better than this :p
